title: Big South Fork National River & Recreation Area: Field Trips
body: Field Trips      Welcome to the online field trip reservation system for Big South Fork National River & Recreation Area!   Please scroll through the list of programs below to locate a program and date that is appropriate for your class, and click "Register online" to send your request to Big South Fork environmental education staff. We will contact you to confirm the date and program details. Since this is the first season that the National Park Service is using the newly developed system nationwide, and it was developed at the request of teachers, please provide feedback to us so that we can communicate it to the system developers at the national level.   If you cannot find a date that works for your schedule or have any other questions about the reservation process, please contact the Environmental Education Office at (423) 286-9059 ext. 29, or e-mail us.    Click on the following links for information about planning your visit and fees and reservations.     Results  There are no results to show.
